ue to the influence of the active southwest monsoon weather condition, showery  weather
over the Western, and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Galle, Matara, Nuwara-Eliya and Kandy
districts is likely to enhance during the next few days.

howers or thundershowers will occur at times in Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-western
provinces and in Nuwara-Eliya, Kandy, Galle and Matara districts.

and in Nuwara-Eliya, Kandy, Galle and Matara districts.
